name: Ruby Rose
description:
The Internet is the worst.

Ruby Rose, the actress who was recently announced to be the new Batwoman on CW (that's a TV network, we kid you not), has been harassed. You see, Batwoman is a Jewish lesbian. Rose, to some, is not lesbian enough (she considers herself genderfluid), and, well, not Jewish.

Let us pause for a second and think of an actor... let's say, Tom Hanks. Everyone loves Tom Hanks, right? Well, to take three random movies, Hanks wasn't gay (Philadelphia), wasn't an idiot (Forrest Gump), and sure as hell wasn't an astronaut (Apollo 13). And yet, he acted in those movies! Weird, no?

No, not weird at all! He ACTED. That's what ACTORS do! It doesn't matter what they are in real life, they PRETEND! Is it that hard to comprehend, Internet?

Robert De Niro, Gene Hackman, Robin Williams, Meryl Streep... they are all goys who played Jews on the screen. (And there are hundreds more on that list!) Would you have a problem of De Niro playing a Jew, Internet? They why are you having a problem with Rose?

Stupid, horrible Internet.
